##ANIMATIONS##
## 60 FPS Gameplay
c0d1e191-a251-465d-8a3c-a3be5366d849 Vertex2995, Obesebear, Kaldarasha
iros://Url/http$motr.7thheaven.rocks/60FPS/60%20FPS%20Gameplay.iro 1.12 2022-09-11 All https://i.imgur.com/4T7hFii.png REQUIRES 7th Heaven 2.3.3+ and FFNx 1.11.0+
Changelog: - 1.00: BETA Release - 1.01: Add missing field object models animations - 1.02: Replace all field interpolated animations with new ones generated by Kimera; Fix battle crash due to corrupted animation (Roulette Cannon: jbda, jbca); Add missing animation of Cid's Big Brawl (limcd7.a00); Small fix of battle animation files of Yuffie (limyf6.a00); - 1.03: Add missing interpolated summon animations for battle (30 FPS mode fixed) Add distinct KOTR animation files for 30 FPS battle - 1.04: Improve summons and limit breaks interpolated animations (magic.lgp) Fix Rufus and helicopter animation files sync (csda, cqda) - 1.10: FULL Release (No more BETA!) Add optional fix for FIELD mode 60 FPS animation glitches (Look at README file) - 1.11: Add advanced animation option for FIELD mode (e.g. ChaOS, NinostyleHD) Small fix of battle animation files (Godo: hada) - 1.12: Small fix for char animation FSEB.a (set frame 59 equal to frame 58). Necessary to avoid visual glitch. Fix 60 fps counter speed of lock inside Nibelheim Manor (field map: sinin2_1)
96999
60/30 FPS Gameplay Animations This mod allows the game to run on a higher FPS than the original. It contains two possible modes: - Full 60 FPS: This bumps up the FPS to 60 for battle, field, and world mode. - Full 30 FPS: This bumps up the FPS to 30 for battle mode The mod contains 3D model interpolated animations (battle character models, battle enemy models, field character models, ...) except world character models (unnecessary), chocobo mode models, submarine mode models and highway mode models.
60 fps Animations Obesebear Kaldarasha Vertex2995

8572
60/30 FPS Animations for New Threat 2.0 Animations Provide BATTLE and FIELD mode compatibility of New Threat 2.0 mod with 60 FPS Gameplay mod. Both "Full 30 FPS" and "Full 60 FPS" of 60 FPS Gameplay mod are available (Can be changed in the mod config options)

d9f9ff17-666c-4b5f-8292-4835888a1358 AxlRose https://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=21357.0 https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=FTA38UUZJ5QAN
iros://Url/http$www.gp-mc.net/ff7/axlrose/blender/%5bAxlRose%5d_Blender_v1.7z 1.0 2023-03-01 All https://www.gp-mc.net/ff7/axlrose/blender/preview.png On the Readme 6767
AxlRose's Blender v1 Battle Textures - Fixes the "shadow/light" effect (blending) of the ground/floor for all affected Battle Stages - Improvements to the Battle Fields were done directly to the 3D model's floor meshes - Compatible with most Battle Texture mods
Important: - Place this mod below (After) other texture mods such as "SYW Battle Textures", "AxlRose's Battle Scenes" or "Avalanche Arisen" (Auto Sort)
Big thanks to: - L@Zar0 for the help provided with KimeraCS - Kaldarasha for work-around applying the light/shadows with KimeraCS.
AxlRose Light Shadow Battle Textures

##FIELD TEXTURES##
## Satsuki SYW V5 Field Textures ##
50000000-5555-ff75-5776-520000000002 Satsuki_Yatoshi, Manakaiser, Aavock, L@ZaR0 http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=20434.0
iros://Url/https://syw.7thheaven.rocks/iros/[Tsunamods].SYW.V5.Field.Textures.V5.25.7z 5.25 2023-09-23 All https://i.imgur.com/2ddBcgw.jpg The textures are as close as possible to vanilla textures, but AI upscaled with lots of manual tweaks to get an HD experience of the original game design. This pack also upscales all of the field animations. Those animations can cause slowdown on some fields on some computers. If you get slowdown, please disable the "Advanced Texture Animations" option. (double click on this mod and turn off the "Advanced Texture Animations") To get proper Advanced Texture Animations you need to: -Be on the lastest updated 7th Heaven version from here: https://github.com/tsunamods-codes/7th-Heaven/releases. (Scroll down, click "Assets", and grab 7thHeaven-vxxx_Release.zip) -Then go in 7th "Settings/General Settings" and on the bottom-left you'll find the FFNx section, click canary then check for updates, say yes and then go to "Settings/Game Driver Settings, and click "Restore defaults" next to save. -Then go in 7th "Settings/Game Driver - Animated Textures" and set it to ON. 2495610
[Tsunamods] SYW V5 Field Textures Field Textures AI upscaled field textures

0 Lost Wing Gameplay Difficulty mod with a huge overhaul of the battle system. Including new materia, and items! Lost Wing is a FF7 Overhaul that completely modifies many aspects of the game. It is moderately difficult until the Huge Materia quests, then it becomes Extremely Difficult. Hacking/Cheating/Modding All Equipment and/or Materia is encouraged post-Diamond WEAPON.

## Hardcore ##
689f9442-2ae8-4de5-b3a7-7099de769e97 gjoerulv https://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=15975.0
iros://Url/http$qhimm.7thheaven.rocks/Catalog 4.0/Gameplay/Hardcore - gjoerulv.iro 1.0 2007-06-23 https://i.imgur.com/iFNDVAP.png
5178
0 Hardcore Mod Gameplay Basically boosts the game difficulty. This mod mainly strives to refresh the gameplay by sticking to the original settings, BUT it also tweaks some enemy AI, spell effect, equipments, etc, for different reasons. For instance, there are quite a few bugs in the AI and field scripts. Most of these have been fixed. Also, many equipments, spells and enemy skills are useless, gets obsolete and/or are overpowered or cheap. Thus some equipments and attack effects are tweaked in an attempt to balance things out. With the above said, keep in mind things have been kept as close to the original as possible while refreshing the gameplay. For those of you that don't want a new FF7, but want a refreshed, more difficult FF7.
gjoerulv Gameplay Difficulty

iros://Url/http://7thheaven.rocks/releases/Symphonic_Remasters_Redux.iro 2.0 2020-07-18 All https://i.imgur.com/n0H52S0.png A re-release of the Symphonic Remasters FF7 soundtrack with the overall volume levels now closely matching the game's OST, other volume/loop fixes, Loopstart only, on/off selection of individual tracks, reduced file size, and high-resolution intro/ending videos now with SFX. All made from the original lossless audio and packaged for 7th Heaven. 519999
0 Symphonic Remasters: Redux Complete FF7 soundtrack replacement in a symphonic style. Thanks to Bonez for the artwork and Satsuki for video upscales! To hear the included intro/ending movies, place this mod above other movie mods. If other music mods include movies, disable the movies from the other mods if possible. Media

IFRIT - FF7 Interface Tweaks User Interface A collection of tweaks for the FF7 interface.
Features: - Interface Compatibility (Stock, SYW, ESUI) - Optimize stock main menu and other UI elements - Choose between stock and 16:9 battle UI layouts - Move stock battle UI to the bottom of the screen - Different styles of AI enhanced Avatars - Set Avatar resolution - Transparent dialogue boxes - Intro Logos
